resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In

Almost done! Change one of your rune pages to the number below in order to prove ownership of the summoner account. After changing your rune page, wait about five seconds before pressing DONE to allow for the Riot servers to update.
Click the + button to add friends
Are you sure you want to remove this summoner from your friends list?
No stats were found. Swipe down to retrieve the newest stats.
You have no friends to compare stats with!
Cannot add yourself as a friend
